name: Sky-High Samurai
description:
Slinging Samurai one by one is outdated.
Try the new sensational, action-packed, never-ending-Samurai-launching game ? Sky-High Samurai!

Fire your army of aerodynamic Japanese Samurai high into the sky to defeat enemy troops!
They'll come by foot, they'll come on horseback, they'll come flying from the sky... But never fear, for Sky-High Samurai is here!

[ Who is Sky-High Samurai? ]
It's a bird! It's a plane! It's Sky-High Samurai!
Take these Japanese soldiers to the air and soar through epic battles!

[ Easy One-Handed Gameplay ]
Simply slide your finger around to change the trajectory of your current of Samurai!
Defeat the Boss at the end of each battle to emerge victorious!

[ Quirky Cute Characters ]
Grow to love watching your comical warriors fill your screen with parabolas of chaos!

[ Strengthen Your Army ]
Win battles to collect loot and purchase upgrades to make your army stronger!



* This game is available for iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad.
(Recommended iPhone 4S/iPod touch 5th or later)
